title: Article 2 - Hospitals
content:
Article 2 - Hospitals

State Regulations

Part 405 - Hospitals-Minimum Standards (§ 405.1 to 405.1053 to 405.1057)

Part 406 - Rural Hospital Swing Bed Demonstration (§ 406.1 to 406.6)

Part 407 - Primary Care Hospitals-minimum Standards (§ 407.1 to 407.14)

Part 408 - Central Services Facility Rural Health Networks (csfrhn) (§ 408.1 to 408.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 405 - Hospitals-Minimum Standards (§ 405.1 to 405.1053 to 405.1057)

Part 406 - Rural Hospital Swing Bed Demonstration (§ 406.1 to 406.6)

Part 407 - Primary Care Hospitals-minimum Standards (§ 407.1 to 407.14)

Part 408 - Central Services Facility Rural Health Networks (csfrhn) (§ 408.1 to 408.4)
